1.content:
Provided that you read the introduction, let's get on with the story with some characters! If you don't like these choices then you have the pleasure of inserting your own.

Claire and Megan
Two smoking hot blondes, 5'10 and 5'8 who appear to be coming to the theme park in search of a good time for a week, but instead are trying to uncover the truths behind this place for their fist major story! Claire is more loose than the two, always looking to have fun and do different things. Megan on the other hand is somewhat strict and a fitness nut. She lives to stay in shape and tries to exercise every day.

Drie
The ghetto girl from the big city who has been sneaking into the Fatusement Resort for over a week and has been able to leave without gaining a single pound! She lives to steal and swindle others, but who knows whenever her luck will run out?

Cindy and Kim
Two theatre performers who stay at the Resort for a month to audition for the many Fat themed plays they have here. They're both in it for the lead roles, but only one can be chosen.
Cindy is tall, spanaird, and a bit on the snippy side. She has a good figure with the exception of her slight paunch on her stomach and noticeably big ass. Kim is a quite woman, who's short with thick legs and an ass much bigger than Cindy's, but she more cheerful and experimental
1.title: The start

choices: Explore the Hotel for a while
11.content:
Claire set down her luggage and unpacked all of her essentials, "Are you ready to have fun, Megan?" She sang in a joyful tune. Megan was not amused, "We aren't here to have fun. Don't forget that we need to get the story and uncover-" Claire blahhed, "Yeah, yeah. People are getting fatter because of something here. Look, this is the funnest place around and while I'm here I'm going to enjoy what I can. Besides, those tickets were expansive." Megan folded her arms, "Fine, if I get the big scoop then I'll take all the credit."

Claire finished applying her sunscreen and left to explore the resort, "See ya, later kill joy." The door closed, Megan sighed and brought out all of her survey lance equipment. Cameras upon Cameras upon Cameras were unloaded from the bag.

She looked outside, it was a nice, beautiful day to be at a resort. She saw the people playing, eating, and enjoying themselves, "The job comes first." Megan booted up her laptop and inserted the CamPro software in the CD tray, "Come on. Lets hurry." A window popped up on the screen and read that installation would take about 8 hours, Megan huffed.

"Well, I guess there's nothing to do except wait." Megan thought. Until she figured out that there were a plethora off things to do kill the time. Megan stared outside once more and....
11.title: Claire and Megan

choices: The stuffing of a life time
1111.content: When you made it there you saw Claire at the strange short line but you still went over and waited till you were going on the ride that was called...
1111.title: A ride

choices: Tell them they have the wrong room
Let the food right on in
To see Marine and Esha who wanted to clean her room
112.content:
Megan felt a gurgle in her stomach, "I can't be hungry already. I only ate.....oh....9 hours ago." She looked outside and thought about headed over to a restaurant for a quick salad, "But, then I might get wrapped in all of...this." The amusements, the rides looks so eye-catching pleasing. She couldn't risk leaving the room.

"They have to have some sort of room service or something. All good hotels do. Aha!" Megan found the calling card slip with all of the hotel services, janitors, personal massages, wake up call, "and room service!" Hearing her stomach grumble again, Megan dialed the number at lightning speed, "Hello. Room Service. Yes, I'd like a salad and te- what's that? You don't serve salads? Well, what do you have? Fine, I'll.....take 3 of those."

"Would I order that?" Megan slammed down the phone. Someone she had been goaded into ordered 3 Fatuesment's park's biggest burgers. Megan picked up the food info flyer from the door knob, "Yep, 25 inches of delicious cow meat coming my way."

She tossed the flyer and wondered why did she- There was a knock at the door, "Okay, just simply tell them that you made a mistake and would like something a bit healthier."

Megan open the door to....
112.title: Ordered Lunch via Room Service

choices: Claire tries on the Suntan lotion
Claire remembers she has her own
"Sandra can you demonstrate that on yourself after Lunch?"
115.content:
"Thank God, I left. There's no telling how snippy Megan would've gotten." Claire tipped her sunglasses above her blonde hair, "Why can't she just kick back and relax like normal people?"

Claire gazed out of the glass pane of the elevator. The inside of the hotel looked like a beautiful, exotic eutopia. Complete with a waterfall and lively floral decor. If there's only one negative about this place that she thought of it's that, "There are too many fatties here! Ugh, why so many?" The entire buffet line was to light to a moth. They swarmed around their day and night only to catch breaks for sleep.

The elevator reached the lobby floor, Claire stepped out and was immediately greeted by a employee, "Hello, my name is Sandra. Is there anything I can do for you?" Blocking Claire's path is a 6 foot tall, 28 year old, hot Asian woman wearing a blue silk dress with a name tag. Her figure was clad in the garment.

Claire was confused, she didn't exactly ask for help, "Um, no. Thank you." she stepped aside, "Well, maybe you should wear Fatusement Suntan lotion before walking out in the hot sun."

Claire turned and thought, "Free suntan lotion, I guess I could......"
115.title: Starting the day with Claire

choices: Gave Drie a standard room key
Handed Drie the super deluxe room key
12.content:
11PM. Night.

Drie hope over the gate, "You'd think they'd tighten security around here." She dug into her shorts pocket and brought of a forged ticket warranting a free 7 day stay here at the Resort.

She decided to do that since it would be much easier to steal from here if she had a place to store all of her possessions. Drie made a small right turn and exited the bushes. She steadily walked towards the hotel, keeping the straightest face possible.

The double doors slid open and Drie was greeted by the kindly old greeter. A young, burger rather massive Front Desk Attendant answered to Drie's attention. Drie couldn't help but to 'oogle' at the woman's generous bust. "Yo, I gotta card-"

"Ah, yes Drie. We've been expecting you." Drie grew slightly never as to no one should've known she was coming. Just then the Attendant....
12.title: Drie

choices: Coming with me on a lunch break
A different way to start the story?
13.content:
Cindy held the script in her hands and went through the scene multiple times in her head. She worried that the way she would perform it would not be to the caster's liking. The same went through Kim's head as she sat on her ample posterior and contemplated the best direction for the lines. They were both nervous, but a good kind of nervous.

Kim wore her basic white t-shirt and black leggings that hugged her thick legs. While Kim was all dolled up, wearing make-up, a green up shirt, and a long skirt that draped past her knees.

Cindy looked around at the other actors auditioning for roles and noticed that they were all obese! Some of them even sweated buckets from just reciting her lines! "I guess the people are getting their 'roles' after all." Cindy chuckled.

The director reared her head from the door, "Cindy." "Good luck, Cindy!" Cindy nodded and walked off to the room, "Uh, can we have you too...miss-" Kim smiled, "Kim! My name is Kim!" The director meekly smiled, "Come on in!"

Kim entered the room with Cindy at her side, Cindy focused all of her concentration towards performing the scene. Before Cindy could open her mouth, the director, an Indian woman with a surprisingly curvy figure raised her hand. "Okay, you two are...."
13.title: Cindy and Kim

14.content: Blair and Erica: A recently married lesbian couple, the trip to the park being Erica's gift to her amusement park-loving spouse, Blair. Blair is an outgoing twenty four year old with a lithe build, long blond hair, dark brown eyes, and tan skin. Erica, on the other hand, isn't as statuesque as her wife. A quieter person entirely, Erica is Japanese-American, with pale skin, dark eyes, and somewhat skinny.
14.title: Your choices

choices: The pair go on the rollercoaster and end up starved for some reason.
Erica doesn't like the look of the rollercoaster and they go on another ride.
141.content:
"Oh my gosh, this place is amazing!" Blaire exclaimed, turning a full circle to take in the vast park before her. Swiftly taking her gander, she moves back to her wife, hugging Erica for all she was worth. "Oh thank you, thank you, thank you honey!"

Erica giggled at her wife's exuberance, nodding. "You're welcome honey, but shouldn't we get our bags to the hotel first? We are here for two weeks, after all."

"Yeah, yeah, but then we're going on the largest rollercoaster here, got it?"

"Sounds good."

So the couple made their way towards their hotel, paying no mind to the waddling, wheezing, women they spotted here and there.

Once inside, the hotel matched the grand nature of the park as a whole, with the best carpets and fixtures money could buy. Grabbing their room key from the cheery, and quite chubby, desk worker, the couple rode the gilded elevator up to the fourth floor and to their rooms.

Swiftly placing their luggage by their bed, Blaire nearly dragged Erica out of their room and back down the elevator.

Despite herself, Erica couldn't help but chuckle at Blaire's glee.
141.title: Blaire and Erica

1412.content: There is the hall of fatness and others
1412.title: Erica doesn't like the look of the rollerco...

142.content:
Sasha and Natalie
Two brunette best friends and former cheerleaders who are coming to the park to seek a good time. They both work in a bakery and love to shop. They are somewhat ditzy and not too bright.
Sasha has a petite build and stands at 5'7. She's very outgoing but can sometimes be rude or insensitive. Never did well in school, being the duller of the two. Sasha tends to gain in the belly and boobs.
Natalie is a slightly chubbier girl who stands at 5'5. She's a tad shy and a closet lesbian and chubby chaser. She has a crush on Sasha and secretly wants her to fatten up.
142.title: Other choices.

143.content:
Marine:
One of the first janitorial service workers at the resort. Marine 20, is of Middle-Eastern decent though she was born American. She's 5'8" with long black hair that reaches past her shoulders. Marine wears black pants and a stripped black overcoat that she uses to hide her pudgy stomach, soft arms, and breasts. Hell, she's so self conscious about it that she wears it during the summer. Her job is to follow Esha who is currently showing her the ropes.

Esha:
Esha is a proud Indian immigrant who was a small grasp on the english language. She has a smallish-thinnish frame except for her thick legs and wide hips standing at 5'6 She came to America look for opportunity and a job. She's happy and overly glad that she was hired on the spot at the Resort. Her job is to stick with Marine as they go around cleaning up the various messes around the park, although they are allowed to keep anything they find.
143.title: Marine and Esha

choices: The rollercoasters would be a good start
Eh, there really isn't much to do, I'll show you around.
1431.content:
Marine slapped on her work gloves. Today would be her first day working at the Fatusement park. In a way, she was excited about having a job at the grand place, but as to why the theme would be 'fat' left her stumped, "Why not cartoon characters or something...smarter?"

Although, she couldn't argue, seeing as the place was really racking in the money and the employees earn a high minimum wage. Marine punched in for work at 8:30, "Hello, are you Marine?" Marine saw a obvious, Indian immigrant standing next to her. She sighed, "Yep, I'm Marine."

The girl smiled, "Nice to meet you, I'm Esha." They shook hands, "Come along. I will train you." Marine almost chuckled at the girl's bad English. Esha grabbed a long wheeled trash carrier and exited the janitorial services and entered the main area of the park.

"We're do we start?" asked Marine. Esha opened her mouth to say,...
1431.title: Marine and Esha

info.brief_description: Women pack on the pounds at the funnest place to be! PG13+.
info.description:
No one knows how or where this place came to be. There's no history, no known owner, and most of the employees are hired on the spot by a machine. Weird, right? Anyways, all anyone knows is that the Fatusement park is where delicious food and fun come together.

So, the way that the story works is that someone, either fat or skinny, comes into the park only to leave larger than they were. Research data has shown that they average consumer has gained at least 30 pounds during their stay. It really doesn't matter how long the duration, whether it be staying for a day or delivering a package, there will always be some form of weight gain. At least, that's according to the Fatusement policy.

Characters can gain wether for even the most mundane reasons. For example, Anne enters the elevator and presses the button for the top floor. As the elevator slowly rises, so does her weight. Stepping out on the 80th floor Anne felt entirely different. Her stomach thickened, widened, and expanded. Making her shirt ride upwards and creating love handles that slightly spilled from the sides. It became nice and round, resting on the waist of her pants. Etc....

Or

Deja fastened herself into the roller coaster, "Fatty's Fumble? That's a hella weird name". She looked around and noticed that the seats were made for either much more people than one or really large riders. "Good thing I'm the only one here. more fun for me!" She rested back waiting for the ride to start.
Suddenly steam decompressed from the sides and the gears started to move, "Here we go!" The ride sped through many rickety twists and turns, Deja held her hands up high, feeling the wind flow through her hair, "Uh, oh here comes a drop!" Down below she could see something resembling sugary snack cakes in a troth. The ride swooped downward, only to suddenly stop and fill the remain ain't space with those treats.

She had no idea as to why this happened but, "Hey. Free food." She instantly dug into the morsels, biting into every pie, eating every cupcake, and devouring each chocolate. She knew eating like this would catch up to her later on, but when would this happen again?

Deja felt her shirt and shorts tighten, "What happe-! Oh!" She saw her belly push towards the front of her shirt and her thighs much thicker than usual. Nearly filling the leg holes of her shorts, "Okay, now this place is rea-" A camera flashed, capturing her progress.

Before we get to the rules let's get to know the locations in the park.

Central Plaza
Usually, the first place where the character(s) begin their story. The bright brick road paves the way for the rest of the park Located inside the plaza are a pretzel stand with massive portions, vending machines, a water fountain filled with strange coins, clothing store with hidden properties, and a delightful candy store.

Fatlantis
Basically, it's right there in the title. 'Fatlantis', is much more than just a pun like the 'Fatusement' Park. It's a place where the patrons can swim and forget all about their troubles. Just don't go into the deep end or eat at the concession stand. It may cause bloating.

The 5 Star *sigh* Fatel
Recently titled the fanciest hotel in all of the US. The Fatel provides to all of the guest's petty needs. No matter how tedious or unnecessary the task seems, the staff is always at the ready. Usually, the guests tend to become gluttonous and lazy if the stay around too long.

Fatusement Theme Park
Now here is where all of the real fun is. Rollercoasters, joy rides, slow rides, and carnival games. All hosted here at the theme park. This is the true attraction to the Fatusement Park. The patrons don't even care how big they're getting, cause they're having too much fun!

Theatre District
This is where all of the shows take place. The latest movies and the best productions are only found here! Inside the theatre seat extra large seats for the bigger audiences because the audience tends to grow with the unhealthy, buttery, snack foods.

*More Locations to come*

So, now that that is established. Let's get to the rules.

Female WG only (sorry girls and some guys)
No one under the age of 18.
Celebrities and people alike are allowed
Blueberry, Weight Loss, Water inflation, breast/butt/hourglass, air inflation is allowed in this story (Along with Weight Gain, duh)
Nothing involving toilettes or grossing out.
No in depth sex.
Light slob is allowed (smell, drool, IQ drop) no farting or anything like that. Although, belching is completely fine.
Also, any effect is the story can be reversed. So someone can go from fat to skinny and hen I've on to any other form of expansion.
You can create more locations and areas as the story moves along.

That's it! Enjoy the interactive!
